RelatedSentence: PHILADELPHIA - Once the clear front - runner to be the Democratic nominee for governor of Pennsylvania , Rep. Allyson Y. Schwartz sounded annoyed as she spoke up during a candidates debate to correct the moderator on a key point - her name .

The February exchange , prompted by an innocent slip of the tongue , was an early indicator of the frustrations that have engulfed the once - promising candidacy of Schwartz , a fixture in Democratic politics here for two decades who , polls show , is likely to lose in Tuesday 's primary .
